title: Cant install game.
body: "Another version of this product is already install..." appears whenever i try to redownload the game. I have already deleted all the files i can and have uninstalled the game. What can i do?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you restarted your computer since you uninstalled the game?

If you have and it's still not working could you download [CCleaner](https://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/download) and run the included registry cleaner, apply all fixes it suggests.

Does the install work as expected now? If not, let me know.
